CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 信；信函；字母；文学；法律文书；正式文书（letters）；字面确切含义
用字母标记；在…上刻字；被授予校队字母奖章（如在美国高中和大学体育中）

synonym.mean: 信；字母，文字；证书；文学，学问；字面意义

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有学问的；有文化修养的；标有字母的
写印刷体字母（letter的过去式）
用字母写；用印刷体写（letter的ing形式）
文字书写员；文字雕刻员

word_mean_info__list.difference: 集合名词，指全部来往信件。
最普通用词，泛指一切形式的书信，尤指邮寄的信。
指内容直截了当的短信或便条，正式或非正式均可。
指整个字母系统或一种语言的字母表，不表单个字母。
通常指汉语的方块字，也指字符。

word_group.brief_definition: 邀请信函；邀请函；邀请信
英文大写字母；字母大写；大写
接受函；录取通知书；接受信
死信, 无法投递的邮件
丝毫不差, 不折不扣, 精确地
法律(或法规)的准确字面意义

bilingual.source: I was about to go get the letter.
Well, you could write him a letter.

list.abstract: letter（英 [ˈletə]，美 [ˈletər]），英语单词。做名词时，指字母、信件、确切措辞等；做动词时，指镌刻于、被授予校名首字母标志、用字母标注。英语短语有write a letter，译为写封信，例句有He replied to my letter very quickly.（他很快给我回了信。） 复数：letters。第三人称单数：letters。现在分词：lettering。过去式：lettered。过去分词：lettered。近义词为literature、knowledge等。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh look. A letter from my mom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妈妈来信了。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy, is the other letter for you? No, this one's for Peppa and George. A letter for George and me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，另外一封信是要给你的？不是，这封信是要给佩奇和乔治的。给我和乔治的信吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Can I have my letter from Delphine, please? Sorry Peppa, there is no letter for you today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能看看戴芬寄给我的信吗，拜托？对不起，佩奇，今天没有寄给你的信，佩奇。

yingyinNormal.en: I wrote you a letter. Oh. Thank you. I like mail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我写了封信给你。谢谢，我喜欢收信。

yingyinNormal.en: And he gave me this letter that I've kept to this day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他给了我这封信，我一直保存到今天。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, if it's okay, I'd like to hear the letter, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官大人，如果可以的话，我想听听那封信。

yingyinNormal.en: My mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在她收到信的那一天，我的父母是多么的自豪。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, Corporal Doss. Let me have the letter. You must go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你，下士多斯。让我看看这信。你得离开。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a letter from Mike O'Donnell. He wanted me to read it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是迈克奥唐奈写的信，他想让我念给大家听。

yingyinNormal.en: Francis held on to your resignation letter. And he wants to tear it up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗兰西斯还留着你的辞职信。他想把它撕掉。

yingyinNormal.en: There's something else in there, a letter. What does it say, Serena?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里面还有些东西，一封信，上面说了什么，瑟琳娜？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. You sent more than one letter about that? It bothers me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 打断一下，你为此寄了好几封信过去？它们看着太碍眼了。

yingyinNormal.en: You read the letter. You were a very near miss. So, next time, you'll hit the target.
yingyinNormal.zh: 信你也看了,你只是差一点,下次一定能行。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't understand. Did Matthew leave instructions after all? He left a letter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不明白，马修终究还是留了遗嘱吗？他留下了一封信。

yingyinNormal.en: My goodness, so many letters today. And this letter is mine. It is very very important. Is it for me? Can I open it now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天啊，今天有好多的信啊。这封信是我寄的。可是非常非常的重要哦。这是给我的吗？我现在能打开吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What was in the letter? I don't know. She wouldn't tell me. But it was too late.
yingyinNormal.zh: 信里说了什么？我不知道，她不肯告诉我，但一切都太晚了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. There's something I have to tell you. What? I know what was in your dad's letter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢着，我有话要对你说。什么？我知道那封信的内容了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ms. Zoe zebra. Zoe zebra Zoe zebra Zoe zebra. Oh, all the post is for Zoe. That's my letter. Can I post it? Certainly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斑马佐伊小姐的。斑马佐伊，斑马佐伊，斑马佐伊。所有的信都是佐伊的。那封是我的信。能让我来送吗？当然可以了。

yingyinNormal.en: You're a lawyer? Yes. I was intrigued by your letter, but I can't say I wholly understood it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是个律师？是的。你的信很有意思，但我没有完全看懂。

yingyinNormal.en: It is early morning. Mr Zebra the postman is delivering a letter to Peppa's house. Post.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在是清晨。邮递员斑马先生来给佩奇家送了一封信。来信了！

exam_freq_info.chinese: (to the letter)不折不扣; 精确地
活字; 铅字; 镌刻

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 丝毫不差；不折不扣；精确地

sense_info_list.en: a written message addressed to a person or organization

examination_example.sentence: Do not sign your own name at the end of the <highlight>letter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要在信的结尾签上你的名字。

examination_example.sentence: Write a <highlight>letter</highlight> of about 100 words to the president of your university, suggesting how to improve students' physical condition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给你的大学校长写一封100字左右的信，给出如何改善学生的身体状况的建议。

examination_example.sentence: In 2010, leading congressional Democrats and Republicans sent <highlight>letters</highlight> to the AAAS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2010年，美国国会的重要民主党人和共和党人向美国人文与科学院致信。

sense_info_list.en: a character representing one or more of the sounds used in speech; any of the symbols of an alphabet

examination_example.sentence: When younger kids learn computer science, they learn that it's not just a confusing, endless string of <highlight>letters</highlight> and numbers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当孩子们学习计算机科学时，他们会发现计算机科学不仅仅是一串令人困惑的、没完没了的字母和数字。

examination_example.sentence: The popularity of these novels consolidated Dickens' as a nationally and internationally celebrated man of <highlight>letters</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些小说的流行巩固了狄更斯作为国内和国际知名文学家的地位。

sense_info_list.zh: (to the letter)不折不扣; 精确地

examination_example.sentence: The White House argued that Arizona's laws conflicted with its enforcement priorities, even if state laws complied with federal statutes to the <highlight>letter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白宫方面称，即使亚利桑那州的法律完全遵守了联邦法规，该州的法律也与联邦法律的优先执行权相矛盾。

sense_info_list.en: a strictly literal interpretation, as distinct from the intention

sense_info_list.zh: 活字; 铅字; 镌刻

sense_info_list.en: an award earned by participation in a school sport
owner who lets another person use something, housing usually for hire
a written communication containing a grant

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a written message addressed to a person or organization

examination_example.sentence: In 1863, after 17 years of advocacy including <highlight>letters</highlight> to five presidents, Hale got it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过17年的倡导(包括致五位总统的信)，Hale 最终于1863年成功了。

examination_example.sentence: In his resignation <highlight>letter</highlight>, Morgan called the reorganization "unworkable".
examination_example.sentence_trans: Morgan 在辞职信中称该重组是“不可行的”。

examination_example.sentence: Morgan notified the Haslam administration of his decision to opt out in a <highlight>letter</highlight> sent last week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Morgan 在上周的一封信中通知 Haslam 政府，他决定退出。

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>letter</highlight>, which includes several concerns Morgan has with the plan, was originally obtained by The Commercial Appeal in Memphis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这封信中包含了 Morgan 对该计划的一些担忧，最初是由孟菲斯的商业上诉机构( The Commercial Appeal in Memphis )获得的。

sense_info_list.en: a character representing one or more of the sounds used in speech; any of the symbols of an alphabet

word_usage.usage: letter指“字母”，汉语中的“汉字”要用character来表示。如 Chinese characters 中国汉字。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指整个字母系统或一种语言的字母表, 不表单个字母。
通常指汉语的方块字, 也指字符。
指单个的字母。
集合名词, 指全部来往信件。
最普通用词, 泛指一切形式的书信, 尤指邮寄的信。
指书信、口信、电报等。
指内容直截了当的短信或便条, 正式或非正式均可。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a written message addressed to a person or organization

examination_example.sentence: Other choices, in descending order of personalization, are: a real-time phone call, a voice-mail message, a handwritten note, a typewritten <highlight>letter</highlight>, and the most unfriendly is email.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以个性化降序排列的其他选择包括：实时电话，语音邮件，手写便条，打字机信件，最不友好的是电子邮件。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>letter</highlight> written by Charles Darwin in 1875 has been returned to the Smithsonian Institution Archives (档案馆) by the FBI after being stolen twice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查尔斯·达尔文(Charles Darwin)在1875年写的信在两次被盗后已被联邦调查局(FBI)退回史密森学会档案馆。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, the FBI received a tip that the stolen document was located very close to Washington, D. C. Their art crime team recovered the <highlight>letter</highlight> but were unable to press charges because the time of limitations had ended.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，联邦调查局(FBI)收到线索，被盗文件的位置离华盛顿特区非常近。他们的艺术犯罪小组找回了这封信，但由于诉讼时效已经结束，无法提出指控。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of bringing families together, Aderhold's <highlight>letter</highlight> revealed a divide in the district, which has 9,700 students, and one that broke down roughly along racial lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿德霍尔德的信非没能让家长们团结起来，反而揭露了这个拥有9700名学生的学区存在的分歧，而且这种分歧大致是按照种族界限来划分的。

examination_example.sentence: The FBI worked closely with the Archives to determine that the <highlight>letter</highlight> was both authentic and definitely Smithsonian's property.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联邦调查局(FBI)与档案馆密切合作，确定这封信既是真迹，而且绝对是史密森尼的财产。

examination_example.sentence: The intern likely took the <highlight>letter</highlight> again once nobody was watching it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦没有人看信了，实习生可能会再次拿走这封信。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>letter</highlight> is in fairly good condition, in spite of being out of the care of trained museum staff for so long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管长期不在训练有素的博物馆工作人员的照顾下，这封信的状况还不错。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>letter</highlight> was written by Darwin to thank an American geologist, Dr. Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden, for sending him copies of his research into the geology of the region that would become Yellowstone National Park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 达尔文写这封信是为了感谢一位美国地质学家费迪南德·范德维尔·海登博士(Dr. Ferdinand Vandeveer Hayden)给他寄来了后来成为黄石国家公园的地区的地质学研究的副本。

examination_example.sentence: This fall, David Aderhold, the chief of a high-achieving school district near Princeton, New Jersey, sent parents an alarming 16-page <highlight>letter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫·阿德霍尔德(David Aderhold)是一位学区负责人，该学区位于新泽西州普林斯顿附近，成绩优异。今年秋天，该学区负责人给家长们写了一封令人担忧的信，长达十六页。

examination_example.sentence: With his <highlight>letter</highlight>, Aderhold inserted West Windsor-Plainsboro Regional School District into a national discussion about the intense focus on achievement at elite schools, and whether it has gone too far.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过阿德霍尔德的这封信，西温莎-普莱斯伯勒地区学区加入到了一场关于精英学校过分重视学业成绩的全国性讨论。讨论还谈及这些学校是否为了取得好成绩而做得有些过头了。

sense_info_list.en: a character representing one or more of the sounds used in speech; any of the symbols of an alphabet

examination_example.sentence: Initially, kids learn numbers much like they learn <highlight>letters</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初，孩子们学习数字就像他们学习字母一样。

examination_example.sentence: The tests are designed to detect subtle (细微的) changes in mental function, and involve solving puzzles, and identifying patterns in collections of <highlight>letters</highlight> and symbols.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些测试旨在检测大脑功能的微妙变化，包括解决谜题、识别字母和符号集合的模式。

word_usage.usage: letter指“字母”，汉语中的“汉字”要用character来表示。如 Chinese characters 中国汉字。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指整个字母系统或一种语言的字母表，不表单个字母。
通常指汉语的方块字，也指字符。
指单个的字母。
集合名词，指全部来往信件。
最普通用词，泛指一切形式的书信，尤指邮寄的信。
指书信、口信、电报等。
指内容直截了当的短信或便条，正式或非正式均可。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 接受函；录取通知书；接受信

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a character representing one or more of the sounds used in speech; any of the symbols of an alphabet

examination_example.sentence: Another way to hide a message is to use symbols to stand for specific <highlight>letters</highlight> of the alphabet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种隐藏信息的方法是使用符号来代表字母表中的特定字母。

examination_example.sentence: You can hide a message by having the first <highlight>letters</highlight> of each word spell it out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 您可以通过将每个单词的首字母拼写出来来隐藏信息。

examination_example.sentence: Let's number the <highlight>letters</highlight> of the alphabet, in order, from 1 to 26.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们按从1到26的顺序对字母表中的字母进行编号。

sense_info_list.en: a written message addressed to a person or organization

examination_example.sentence: "I have matured and I admit responsibility for my actions," he said in the <highlight>letter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “我已经成熟，我承认对自己的行为负责，”他在信中说。

examination_example.sentence: Motivation <highlight>letter</highlight>: You should have your motivation <highlight>letter</highlight> ready before filling out the application form.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动机信：在填写申请表之前，你应该准备好你的动机信。

examination_example.sentence: The international scholars' warning <highlight>letter</highlight> doesn't say exactly what collapse will look like or when it might happen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国际学者的警告信并没有确切说明崩盘会是什么样子或何时发生。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指整个字母系统或一种语言的字母表，不表单个字母。
通常指汉语的方块字，也指字符。
指单个的字母。
集合名词，指全部来往信件。
最普通用词，泛指一切形式的书信，尤指邮寄的信。
指书信、口信、电报等。
指内容直截了当的短信或便条，正式或非正式均可。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 英文大写字母；字母大写；大写
邀请信函；邀请函；邀请信

sense_info_list.en: a written message addressed to a person or organization

examination_example.sentence: If you'd like to know more about traditional Chinese culture, I will talk about it in the next <highlight>letter</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想了解更多关于中国传统文化的知识，我将在下一封信中谈论它。

examination_example.sentence: He replied to my <highlight>letter</highlight> very quickly (快速地）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他很快给我回了信。

examination_example.sentence: After she came back from the hospital, she found a <highlight>letter</highlight> on her bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从医院回来后，她在床上发现了一封信。

sense_info_list.en: a character representing one or more of the sounds used in speech; any of the symbols of an alphabet

examination_example.sentence: What do the <highlight>letters</highlight> "KIT" mean in the text message?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 短信里的字母“KIT”表示什么意思？

examination_example.sentence: And make sure these capital <highlight>letters</highlight> (大写字母) are written properly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保这些大写字母拼写正确。

examination_example.sentence: The word "listen" has the same <highlight>letters</highlight> as the word "silent".
examination_example.sentence_trans: “听”这个词和“沉默”这个词有着一样的字母。

word_usage.usage: letter指“字母”，汉语中的“汉字”要用character来表示。如 Chinese characters 中国汉字。
